snippet: You bought a domestic coach seat on Delta* and you’re hoping to get a free upgrade at the gate, but there is only one first-class seat available. Follow the steps to find out what your chances are.
lead_paragraph: You bought a domestic coach seat on Delta* and you’re hoping to get a free upgrade at the gate, but there is only one first-class seat available. Follow the steps to find out what your chances are.

headline.seo: The Chances of Getting a Free Flight Upgrade
headline.main: Pampered Like Royalty, or Canned Like Sardines?
